mapper.sql: trx_id, trx_state, trx_started, trx_requested_lock_id, trx_wait_started, trx_weight, trx_mysql_thread_id, trx_query, trx_operation_state, trx_tables_in_use, trx_tables_locked, trx_lock_structs, trx_lock_memory_bytes, trx_rows_locked, trx_rows_modified, trx_concurrency_tickets, trx_isolation_level, trx_unique_checks, trx_foreign_key_checks, trx_last_foreign_key_error, trx_adaptive_hash_latched, trx_adaptive_hash_timeout, trx_is_read_only, trx_autocommit_non_locking, trx_schedule_weight
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from INNODB_TRX
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into INNODB_TRX (trx_id, trx_state, trx_started, trx_requested_lock_id, trx_wait_started, trx_weight, trx_mysql_thread_id, trx_query, trx_operation_state, trx_tables_in_use, trx_tables_locked, trx_lock_structs, trx_lock_memory_bytes, trx_rows_locked, trx_rows_modified, trx_concurrency_tickets, trx_isolation_level, trx_unique_checks, trx_foreign_key_checks, trx_last_foreign_key_error, trx_adaptive_hash_latched, trx_adaptive_hash_timeout, trx_is_read_only, trx_autocommit_non_locking, trx_schedule_weight) values (#{trxId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{trxState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trxStarted,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{trxRequestedLockId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trxWaitStarted,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{trxWeight,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{trxMysqlThreadId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{trxQuery,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trxOperationState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trxTablesInUse,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{trxTablesLocked,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{trxLockStructs,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{trxLockMemoryBytes,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{trxRowsLocked,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{trxRowsModified,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{trxConcurrencyTickets,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{trxIsolationLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trxUniqueChecks,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trxForeignKeyChecks,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trxLastForeignKeyError,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trxAdaptiveHashLatched,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trxAdaptiveHashTimeout,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{trxIsReadOnly,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trxAutocommitNonLocking,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trxScheduleWeight,jdbcType=BIGINT})

mapper.update:
update INNODB_TRX
trx_id = #{row.trxId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
trx_state = #{row.trxState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trx_started = #{row.trxStarted,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
trx_requested_lock_id = #{row.trxRequestedLockId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trx_wait_started = #{row.trxWaitStarted,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
trx_weight = #{row.trxWeight,jdbcType=BIGINT},
trx_mysql_thread_id = #{row.trxMysqlThreadId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
trx_query = #{row.trxQuery,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trx_operation_state = #{row.trxOperationState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trx_tables_in_use = #{row.trxTablesInUse,jdbcType=BIGINT},
trx_tables_locked = #{row.trxTablesLocked,jdbcType=BIGINT},
trx_lock_structs = #{row.trxLockStructs,jdbcType=BIGINT},
trx_lock_memory_bytes = #{row.trxLockMemoryBytes,jdbcType=BIGINT},
trx_rows_locked = #{row.trxRowsLocked,jdbcType=BIGINT},
trx_rows_modified = #{row.trxRowsModified,jdbcType=BIGINT},
trx_concurrency_tickets = #{row.trxConcurrencyTickets,jdbcType=BIGINT},
trx_isolation_level = #{row.trxIsolationLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trx_unique_checks = #{row.trxUniqueChecks,jdbcType=INTEGER},
trx_foreign_key_checks = #{row.trxForeignKeyChecks,jdbcType=INTEGER},
trx_last_foreign_key_error = #{row.trxLastForeignKeyError,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trx_adaptive_hash_latched = #{row.trxAdaptiveHashLatched,jdbcType=INTEGER},
trx_adaptive_hash_timeout = #{row.trxAdaptiveHashTimeout,jdbcType=BIGINT},
trx_is_read_only = #{row.trxIsReadOnly,jdbcType=INTEGER},
trx_autocommit_non_locking = #{row.trxAutocommitNonLocking,jdbcType=INTEGER},
trx_schedule_weight = #{row.trxScheduleWeight,jdbcType=BIGINT},

update INNODB_TRX set trx_id = #{row.trxId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, trx_state = #{row.trxState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trx_started = #{row.trxStarted,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, trx_requested_lock_id = #{row.trxRequestedLockId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trx_wait_started = #{row.trxWaitStarted,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, trx_weight = #{row.trxWeight,jdbcType=BIGINT}, trx_mysql_thread_id = #{row.trxMysqlThreadId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, trx_query = #{row.trxQuery,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trx_operation_state = #{row.trxOperationState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trx_tables_in_use = #{row.trxTablesInUse,jdbcType=BIGINT}, trx_tables_locked = #{row.trxTablesLocked,jdbcType=BIGINT}, trx_lock_structs = #{row.trxLockStructs,jdbcType=BIGINT}, trx_lock_memory_bytes = #{row.trxLockMemoryBytes,jdbcType=BIGINT}, trx_rows_locked = #{row.trxRowsLocked,jdbcType=BIGINT}, trx_rows_modified = #{row.trxRowsModified,jdbcType=BIGINT}, trx_concurrency_tickets = #{row.trxConcurrencyTickets,jdbcType=BIGINT}, trx_isolation_level = #{row.trxIsolationLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trx_unique_checks = #{row.trxUniqueChecks,jdbcType=INTEGER}, trx_foreign_key_checks = #{row.trxForeignKeyChecks,jdbcType=INTEGER}, trx_last_foreign_key_error = #{row.trxLastForeignKeyError,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trx_adaptive_hash_latched = #{row.trxAdaptiveHashLatched,jdbcType=INTEGER}, trx_adaptive_hash_timeout = #{row.trxAdaptiveHashTimeout,jdbcType=BIGINT}, trx_is_read_only = #{row.trxIsReadOnly,jdbcType=INTEGER}, trx_autocommit_non_locking = #{row.trxAutocommitNonLocking,jdbcType=INTEGER}, trx_schedule_weight = #{row.trxScheduleWeight,jdbcType=BIGINT}
